sentences.en: a film that will bore its young audience
sentences.cn: 会让年轻观众感到无聊的一部电影

sentences.en: All the letters bore an Aberdeen postmark.
sentences.cn: 所有的信件上都盖有阿伯丁郡的邮戳。

sentences.en: Emma bore a son called Karl.
sentences.cn: 埃玛生了个儿子叫卡尔。

sentences.en: Get the special drill bit to bore the correct size hole for the job.
sentences.cn: 找个特殊的钻头，钻个尺寸合适的孔。

sentences.en: He turned out to be a crashing bore (= used to emphasize that someone is very boring ).
sentences.cn: 他这人原来无聊透顶。

sentences.en: He was an insufferable bore.
sentences.cn: 他很讨厌，真令人受不了。

sentences.en: He’s the sort of person who bores you at parties.
sentences.cn: 他这人会在派对上烦你。

sentences.en: Her eyes seemed to bore a hole in mine.
sentences.cn: 她的目光似乎要把我的眼睛看穿。

sentences.en: Hugo bore his illness with great courage and good humour.
sentences.cn: 雨果以巨大的勇气和良好的精神状态面对疾病。

sentences.en: I must have been a bore.
sentences.cn: 我一定让人觉得很无聊。

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: The bore of the gun remained fixed on me.
sentences.cn: 枪口依然指着我。

sentences.en: The ground still bore the imprints of their feet.
sentences.cn: 地面上仍然留有他们的脚印。

sentences.en: The machine bores a hole through the cards.
sentences.cn: 机器会在卡上打一个洞。

sentences.en: The room bore all the signs of a violent struggle.
sentences.cn: 这个房间留有激烈打斗的痕迹。

sentences.en: There was elegance and simple dignity in the way he bore himself.
sentences.cn: 他举止优雅而庄重。

sentences.en: They bore their plight with stoicism and fortitude.
sentences.cn: 他们以坚忍刚毅的精神直面困境。

sentences.en: This guy bore a really freaky resem-blance to Jones.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙和琼斯长得惊人地相似。

sentences.en: To be frank, he could also be a bit of a bore.
sentences.cn: 老实说，他有时也会让人厌烦。

sentences.en: Waiting is a bore.
sentences.cn: 等人很没劲。

sentences.en: You'll bore the pants off your grandchildren.
sentences.cn: 你会把孙辈们烦透的。

sentences.en: You’ll find it’s a terrible bore.
sentences.cn: 你会觉得这事极无聊。

words.tran_cn: 钻孔；使厌烦；挖空（bore的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 令人厌烦得要死（或哭出来）
贯眼；等径孔道；全孔射击

trans.tran_cn: 令人厌烦的人，口径，钻孔，激潮
trans.tran_en: something that is not interesting to you or that annoys you
to make someone feel bored, especially by talking too much about something they are not interested in
